00022 template <class Layer, class View = IShapeView>
00023 class TLayerBaseEx: public TLayerBase<Layer, View>
00024 {
00025 public:
00026        typedef TLayerBase<Layer, View> BaseClass;
00027 
00028        TLayerBaseEx();
00029 
00030        // reimplemented (iview::IShapeView)
00031        virtual void SetVisible(bool state);
00032 
00033        // reimplemented (iview::IDisplay)
00034        virtual i2d::CRect GetBoundingBox() const;
00035        virtual void OnAreaInvalidated(const i2d::CRect& prevArea, const i2d::CRect& newArea);
00036 
00037 protected:
00038        typedef QMap<IShape*, i2d::CRect> ShapeMap;
00039 
00044        bool OnChangeShapeElement(ShapeMap::Iterator elementIter);
00045        
00050        void DisconnectShapeElement(ShapeMap& map, ShapeMap::iterator iter);
00051 
00052        void InvalidateBoundingBox();
00053        i2d::CRect& GetBoundingBoxRef() const;
00054        void SetBoundingBoxValid() const;
00055 
00056        // abstract methods
00057        virtual void CalcBoundingBox(i2d::CRect& result) const = 0;
00058 
00059 private:
00060        mutable i2d::CRect m_boundingBox;
00061        mutable bool m_isBoundingBoxValid;
00062 };

00065 // public methods
00066 
00067 template <class Layer, class View>
00068 TLayerBaseEx<Layer, View>::TLayerBaseEx()
00069 {
00070        m_boundingBox.Reset();
00071        m_isBoundingBoxValid = true;
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 // reimplemented (iview::IDisplay)
00076 
00077 template <class Layer, class View>
00078 inline void TLayerBaseEx<Layer, View>::SetVisible(bool state)
00079 {
00080        m_isBoundingBoxValid = false;
00081        BaseClass::SetVisible(state);
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 // reimplemented (iview::IDisplay)
00086 
00087 template <class Layer, class View>
00088 i2d::CRect TLayerBaseEx<Layer, View>::GetBoundingBox() const
00089 {
00090        if (!m_isBoundingBoxValid){
00091               CalcBoundingBox(m_boundingBox);
00092        }
00093 
00094        m_isBoundingBoxValid = true;
00095        
00096        return m_boundingBox;
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 template <class Layer, class View>
00101 void TLayerBaseEx<Layer, View>::OnAreaInvalidated(const i2d::CRect& prevArea, const i2d::CRect& newArea)
00102 {
00103        if (m_isBoundingBoxValid){
00104               I_ASSERT(!m_isBoundingBoxValid || GetBoundingBoxRef().IsInside(prevArea));
00105 
00106               if (prevArea.IsEmpty() || (
00107                                           (m_boundingBox.GetLeft() < prevArea.GetLeft()) &&
00108                                           (m_boundingBox.GetRight() > prevArea.GetRight()) &&
00109                                           (m_boundingBox.GetTop() < prevArea.GetTop()) &&
00110                                           (m_boundingBox.GetBottom() > prevArea.GetBottom()))){
00111                      m_boundingBox.Union(newArea);
00112               }
00113               else{
00114                      m_isBoundingBoxValid = false;
00115               }
00116               I_ASSERT(!m_isBoundingBoxValid || GetBoundingBoxRef().IsInside(newArea));
00117        }
00118 
00119        BaseClass::OnAreaInvalidated(prevArea, newArea);
00120 }
00121

00123 // protected methods
00124 
00125 template <class Layer, class View>
00126 bool TLayerBaseEx<Layer, View>::OnChangeShapeElement(ShapeMap::Iterator elementIter)
00127 {
00128        I_ASSERT(elementIter.key() != NULL);
00129        I_ASSERT(GetBoundingBox().IsInside(elementIter.value()));
00130 
00131        const i2d::CRect oldBoundingBox = elementIter.value();
00132        const iview::IShape* shapePtr = elementIter.key();
00133        I_ASSERT(shapePtr != NULL);
00134 
00135        elementIter.value() = shapePtr->GetBoundingBox();
00136 
00137        OnAreaInvalidated(oldBoundingBox, elementIter.value());
00138 
00139        return true;
00140 }
00141 
00142 
00143 template <class Layer, class View>
00144 void TLayerBaseEx<Layer, View>::DisconnectShapeElement(ShapeMap& map, ShapeMap::iterator iter)
00145 {
00146        iview::IShape* shapePtr = iter.key();
00147        const i2d::CRect boundingBox = iter.value();
00148        map.erase(iter);
00149 
00150        OnAreaInvalidated(i2d::CRect::GetEmpty(), boundingBox);
00151 
00152        shapePtr->OnDisconnectDisplay(this);
00153 }
00154 
00155 
00156 template <class Layer, class View>
00157 void TLayerBaseEx<Layer, View>::InvalidateBoundingBox()
00158 {
00159        m_isBoundingBoxValid = false;
00160 }
00161 
00162 
00163 template <class Layer, class View>
00164 i2d::CRect& TLayerBaseEx<Layer, View>::GetBoundingBoxRef() const
00165 {
00166        return m_boundingBox;
00167 }

00170 template <class Layer, class View>
00171 void TLayerBaseEx<Layer, View>::SetBoundingBoxValid() const
00172 {
00173        m_isBoundingBoxValid = true;
00174 }
